title: Cruise the Murray River in a Fully Equipped Houseboat for Eight People
description: Reconnect with nature in a four-bedroom houseboat that’ll have you cruising South Australia’s Murray River on a fully-equipped escape for eight people. Discover the secluded backwaters, sparkling lagoons and untouched wilderness of Australia and enjoy a split-level home boasting four queen bedrooms with ensuite, bed linen and towels, five LCD TV’s, BBQ, washing machine and so much more.
offer_address: 8 Lagoon Marina, Renmark, South Australia 5341, Australia

title: Unique South Australia Fully Equipped Houseboat on the Murray River for up to Eight Guests
description:
Moored at a historic riverport in South Australia, this family and group-friendly vessel is your gateway to the Murray River's secluded national parks and unspoiled natural beauty. Travel along quiet waterways, passing towering sandstone cliffs and wetlands teeming with birdlife from the comfort of a well-appointed houseboat with panoramic windows for epic wilderness views.

Discover sparkling lagoons and peaceful backwaters along the winding Murray River, where raw beauty awaits around every corner. Houseboat Escape is perfectly equipped to cater to your every whim, with four spacious queen bedrooms, two large sundecks for basking in the afternoon glow and a fully functional chef's kitchen for cooking up a storm after a breezy day on the water.
offer_address: 8 Lagoon Marina, Renmark, South Australia 5341, Australia
